summary: Provides a MONAI‑based wrapper that automates the full nnU‑Net V2 segmentation pipeline, from dataset preparation and experiment planning through preprocessing, multi‑model cross‑validation training (supporting parallel and single‑GPU execution), validation, ensemble inference, and post‑processing, finally organizing all outputs into a standardized results directory.
business_intent: Enable medical imaging researchers and developers to efficiently launch and manage end‑to‑end nnU‑Net V2 segmentation experiments with minimal manual configuration, ensuring reproducibility, scalability, and streamlined integration into MONAI workflows.
